  2: static char help[] = "Tests dynamic loading of viewer.\n\n";

  4:  #include <petscsys.h>
  5:  #include <petscviewer.h>

  7: int main(int argc,char **args)
  8: {
 10:   PetscViewer    viewer;

 12:   PetscInitialize(&argc,&args,(char*)0,help);if (ierr) return ierr;
 13:   PetscViewerCreate(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,&viewer);
 14:   PetscViewerSetFromOptions(viewer);
 15:   PetscViewerDestroy(&viewer);

 17:   PetscViewerASCIIOpen(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,"stdout",&viewer);
 18:   PetscViewerDestroy(&viewer);
 19:   PetscFinalize();
 20:   return ierr;
 21: }
